SamPy.resolve.misc.modifyArcs.findClosestArcs¶

SamPy.resolve.misc.modifyArcs.findClosestArcs(scis, arcs, tol=8)¶

Tries to match science frames with arcs that have been taken close in time.

Parameters:
  • scis – a list of science files
  • arcs – a list of arc files
  • tol – tolerance how many files before and after the arcs are being identified.
Returns:

out, mapping between science images and corresponding arcs
Return type:

dictionary
